original_text: Paul and his friends continued their journey. They went through the two towns called Amphipolis and Apollonia. Then they arrived in the city of Thessalonica. There was a Jewish meeting place there.
korean_text: 그들이 암비볼리와 아볼로니아로 다녀가 데살로니가에 이르니 거기 유대인의 회당이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Paul and his friends continued their journey
They went through the two towns called Amphipolis
Then they arrived in the city of Thessalonica
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그들은 데살로니가 성에 도착했습니다

sentences.original_text: There was a Jewish meeting place there
